> "Try and talk to her, com link me if anything happens, I'll inform
> Talos" Kenzo said to Blackfang and walked to Talos's office "Sir, the
> maximal that was in the stasis pod, Nightlight, has been awoken,
> although is having problems adapting to the new language circuitry.
> The CR chambor might be able to repair help"
>

{Talos}

    Shifting through the various bots attempting to contact him he turned
his attention to Hot Rod, "Sunhawk is escorting her to some quarters on deck
2, you may be able to catch them before they get there, otherwise you'll
have to check with Sunhawk as to what room she's in..."

    Tapping the comm for Rattrap and the bot he had sent to help, "Ok good,
if you need some rest come back inside otherwise both of you have scouting
duty." Turning the comm over to speak with Kenzo he smiled, "Ah then best
get her to into a cr chamber then, when her language circuits are fixed
bring her to my office."

    Settling back in his chair he looked at the bot that had come in with
Hot Rod, "Now, mind explaining who you are and what you were still doing on
this planet? I thought Primal got all his people off this world..."
